plot: 'Drawing goes ahead of thought' - this is artist's formidable weapon against an atomic bomb. But the most tragic thing is, that PIKADON (nuclear bomb explosion in Hiroshima) is not geography, but the part of common thinking.
title: P.H.
plot_es: 'Drawing goes ahead of thought' - this is artist's formidable weapon against an atomic bomb. But the most tragic thing is, that PIKADON (nuclear bomb explosion in Hiroshima) is not geography, but the part of common thinking.
plot_en: 'Drawing goes ahead of thought' - this is artist's formidable weapon against an atomic bomb. But the most tragic thing is, that PIKADON (nuclear bomb explosion in Hiroshima) is not geography, but the part of common thinking.
